scenes.visual_description: Vibrant, digital comic book art style. Close-up on a futuristic robot eye, glowing electric blue, zooming in as it powers on. Wires and circuits visible beneath translucent panels.

Dynamic, fast-paced montage of various systems booting up: holographic displays flickering to life, energy cores surging with power, intricate gears spinning into motion. Digital comic book aesthetic with bold colors and exaggerated perspectives.
Wide shot of the robot now fully operational, standing tall amidst a futuristic cityscape.  Skyline glows with neon lights. Digital comic book style with strong lines and dramatic lighting.
